summary: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.
cast: Joe Don Baker|Elizabeth Hartman|Leif Garrett|Dawn Lyn|Noah Beery Jr.|Lurene Tuttle|Ed Call|Dominick Mazzie|Lynn Borden|Brenda Benet|Arch Johnson|Russell Thorson|Gil Perkins|Carey Loftin|Warner Venetz|Gene LeBell|Del Monroe|Gene Evans|Bruce Glover|Don Keefer|Felton Perry|Douglas Fowley|Lloyd Tatum|Vaudie Plunk|Wanea Wes|Sam Laws|Rosemary Murphy|John Brascia|Kenneth Tobey|Pearline Wynn|Pepper Martin|Ted Jordan|Red West|Andrew J. Pirtle|Logan Ramsey|Richard X. Slattery|Sidney Clute|John Myhers|Lloyd Harris|Chris Ladd|Jim Sanderson
title: Pisando fuerte
